    enum 
    Direction
    Représentation de la direction que peut prendre un train : de gauche à droite ou de droite à gauche.

    Methods in train with parameters of type Direction
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    Element.enter(Element p, Direction d)
    Method that changes the status of the element to be free and notifies all the trains of the change, while changing the train's direction if it isn't corresponding to the subrailway's direction Note that the train can only enter if the invariant is verified (and that the invariant depends on the direction of the entering train) If the train can't verify the invariant, the train is made to wait.
    boolean
    Element.invariant(Element p, Direction d)
    Method that encodes the invariant conditions, i.e : - if the element isn't occupied, and - the train is entering from the same direction as the subrailway's direction Returns the verification status of the invariant
    void
    Position.updateDirection(Direction d)
    Method that updates the train's direction and notifies all trains on the same railway
    void
    RailwayVisualization.updateTrainPosition(String trainName, int elementIndex, Direction direction)
    Method that updates the train's position on the screen

    Description
     
    Position(Element elt, Direction d)
    Constructor that initializes a position with a direction and an element If either are null, then a NullPointerException is thrown
